Articles.Content: I've been making some vehicle designs of various persuasions (Mostly attempts on Jebediah-scaring) that i'd like to tape and put on youtube. However, I don't have the money nor disk space for Fraps (I've heard 30 seconds is around 6 GB). I've searched it but there's too many to choose from, and i'd just like to get recommendations. I'm running Win7SP1 64-bit.
i use evolve overlay screen capture feature, it is free and has my game time counter

I've been using MSI Afterburner.

Thing you're going to run into is that if you're compressing to any substantial degree on the fly, that's going to hit your CPU really hard, and probably make it lag. You can do somewhat better without causing too much of a problem but they're still going to be large, particularly if recorded at full resolution.
